title: bandidorl
author: bandidorl
content: Hi all, LGS/WPN Premium store here, we sell everything related to Magic The Gathering for crypto, it´s a great opportunity to diversify your portfolio investing in collectibles with demonstrable growth through time.We sell single cards, from the newest editions to Old School cards. Also booster boxes and sealed from editions from 1994-2022.Ask for anything and we will try to get it for you if not in our stock.We can send proofs of being Cardmarket powerseller with more than 35000 sales.Based in Europe but willing to ship worldwide (we will try to quote the safest and cheapest shipping).Let me know if you have any questions.Regards.PD. We also have Digimon TCG, Pokemon TCG, Yugioh and One piece TCG.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Are you buying?  I have some of these any was wondering what you might offer for them?
